medical_history.chief_complaint: The patient presented with a history of uncontrolled bronchial asthma and fever lasting for one week, associated with throat pain and difficulty swallowing.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began one month prior to presentation in March 2018, starting with fever lasting for one week, throat pain, and difficulty swallowing. Two days later, she remained febrile, became hypoactive, and had decreased appetite and oral intake.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Uncontrolled bronchial asthma, managed with Salbutamol and Flixotide inhaler.
